Package index

flowr-package flowr
Transport Modeling

Network Processing

Utility functions to prepare networks graphs (represented using data frames) for analysis with flowr.

linestrings_to_graph()
Convert Linestring to Graph
create_undirected_graph()
Create Undirected Graph
consolidate_graph()
Consolidate Graph
simplify_network()
Simplify Network

Route Choice and Traffic Assignment

Run traffic assignment using path-sized logit model, including efficient built-in route choice algorithm.

run_assignment()
Run Traffic Assignment
print(<flowr>)
Print Flowr Object

Graph Utilities

Utility functions to extract information from graphs (represented using data frames).

normalize_graph()
Normalize Graph Node IDs
nodes_from_graph()
Extract Nodes from Graph
linestrings_from_graph()
Convert Graph to Linestrings
dist_mat_from_graph()
Compute Distance Matrix from Graph
